title: Redgauntlet: A Tale Of The Eighteenth Century
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: There was the fierce Middleton, and the dissoluteRothes, and the crafty Lauderdale; and Dalyell, with his bald head anda beard to his girdle; and Earlshall, with Cameron's blude on his hand;and wild Bonshaw, that tied blessed Mr. Cargill's limbs till the bludesprung; and Dunbarton Douglas, the twice-turned traitor baith to countryand king.
